availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel E. Carpenter (Allen County, Kentucky, farmer and county court clerk proterm )

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer and clerk. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah Downing Carpenter in Barren County, Kentucky, on June 2, 1814. Father of Joseph D. Carpenter, Ann H. Carpenter Orr, Benjamin Carpenter, James Carpenter, Elizabeth Carpenter Hudson, Samuel Carpenter, Sarah G. Carpenter, and Mary F. Carpenter Dixon. Married to Sarah Jane Bryant Harland Carpenter in Allen County on October 31, 1857. Father of Dorinda Carpenter. Farmer in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twenty-seven enslaved persons in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860. Owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Allen County in 1860. Clerk pro-tem of the Allen County Court in 1862.
